reviewText: I had never heard of Tim Allen until I saw the reruns of "Home Improvement".  My husband and I ordered this DVD to see him in stand up comedy and were pleased that it included an interview where he shares his beginning in comedy.  Since then we have read "Never Stand Next to a Naked Man" (hiliarious) and have learned even more about his personal life starting life with the last name of "Dick" and how his name was shortened to the Tim Allen we know.  Everything Tim Allen does is good for those healthy belly laughs we all need.  We own every one of his DVD's and love seeing them again and again when we need a laugh.  This video is worth seeing at least once.
summary: We love Tim Allen - this includes an interview...
Title: Tim Allen: Live On Stage

reviewText: This is where it all began for Tim and his Tool Time Show.  Two of the funniest comic acts will ever watch.  You will see many of the themes from the Tool Time series in his jokes.  Enjoy!!!
Title: Tim Allen: Live On Stage

reviewText: I was really disappointed by this dvd. I love Tim Allen and I love "Home Improvement" and that's why I got this dvd. I could barely sit through the first performance. It was sooo bad and extremely boring. I couldn't even bring myself to watch the second show. It might've been better but I honestly didn't want to waste anymore of my time.
Title: Tim Allen: Live On Stage

reviewText: when I bought this dvd, my expectations were high concerning the "laughing intensity" while watching it. I can only say I laughed and I admired Tim Allen's strong personality. I mean to stand up in front of such a big mass of people and to talk, confortable with your own self, as if you are telling jokes among friends, this is amazing. Also, the creativity of showing differences between men and women, in "tool language", that was cool. Thanks Tim Allen!
Title: Tim Allen: Live On Stage

reviewText: That's right!  Tim Allen is truely one of the BEST.  This DVD includes his 2 classic Showtime masterpieces, Men Are Pigs and Rewires America. In which you'll hear the original routines from the Tool Man that inspired Home Improvement.  Also included on this disc is a very informative interview with Tim Allen and a never released 5 minute short film, Docu-comic.  If you're a fan if Tim Allen, or just stand up comedy, this DVD is for you.
summary: one of the best non-southern comedians of all time
Title: Tim Allen: Live On Stage

reviewText: These are the two stand up performances that pushed Tim Allen into the limelight for all to see in the early 90's.
Title: Tim Allen: Live On Stage
